attributes.action: Ensure there is more life skills in schools to prepare students for the future.
attributes.background: Students leave school not knowing what to do or where to go. If schools give young people and idea of what options they have whether its further education, working  and what they can do with their lives to secure their future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we're not exactly what you mean by "life skills".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223783
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220637
